title: Why are ADC mains so scared of the assassin reworks?
body:
They're giving assassins more counterplay and delay on abilities

You should be worried more about champs that actually will still have no counterplay like Syndra

replies.body:
Because they know their winrate will drop from being absurd to actually have to outplay an enemy.

Not Killing the tank in 3-4 auto's while accientally killing the support and their apc by accident with ruaans.

> [{quoted}](name=1 800 Top Lane,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=kgg36YYs,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-10-20T00:02:56.439+0000)
>
> Because they know their winrate will drop from being absurd to actually have to outplay an enemy.
> 
> Not Killing the tank in 3-4 auto's while accientally killing the support and their apc by accident with ruaans.

I feel like you are just a salty Katarina main who hates ADCs doing their job. Just like ADC mains hate on assassin mains just doing their job.

I appreciate your comment but you can right-click my name and view my history. I actually main bruisers. As my name suggest, Top lane.

But in this current meta, I could snowball my lane 20/0. Teamfight mid-game and get utterly destroyed by  3/8 adc.
Or hell even a 1/9/3 Pure AP support.

Because whether or not they are getting more counterplay, they are gonna get more play.
More people are gonna be playing assassins after a meta where they have been underpowered and not played much.

They also need to learn how to play against these assassins all over again!

And i am gonna be enjoying their tears.
Comon, it's obviously more fun to be stunned from a screen away then being bursted down before the CC wears off. What's not fun about that?

as an adc i was scared about the assassin reworks, but seeing the demonstration vids and a few PBE streams, I really don't have much to fear. Overall the assassins are much more balanced than their currently live predecessors especially {{champion:107}} {{champion:7}} (Because getting popped in under a 1 second is so much fun am i right?) They can still 100-0 some one but, you will have much more time to react to them than being "roflmao you're dead, git gud noob". I do fear talon as his E look like it has little no cooldown for something so powerful

Assassins are getting more limelight, but at the same time we're getting more Tank itemization...

#RitoLearnsThings

See that wall? and that wall? and those walls? Talon is on the other side of them.

The Garen brush uncertainty principle in action.
How are Sorcerer's Bane and new dickblade adding more counterplay again?
